DUMMY: Dummy Dev Text, Delete this text before releasing.
CREATEVM_DISKTYPE_RAW: RAW : Biggest but, fastest Disk type.
CREATEVM_DISKTYPE_VHDX: VHDX : Compatible Disk type with Hyper-V
MSG_CREATEVM_DESC_TCG_ON:
Warning!

Guest Acceleration has been enabled,
This may not work with other OS.
MSG_CREATEVM_DESC_WINDOWS_WARN:
Imaginary found out that Guest OS Type is 'Windows',
But Disk Type neither 'RAW' nor 'VHDX'.

QCow2 Disk Type is not recommened in Windows and,
This Disk Type may slows down the performance of Guest System.

By Clicking OK, user agreed to this information and will continue.
MSG_CREATEVM_TITLE_MACOS_WARN: About Using Darwin/x86 based Operating System
MSG_CREATEVM_DESC_MACOS_WARN:
Imaginary found out that user is trying to install 'macOS',

Imaginary ONLY supports installing 'Windows' and 'Linux' based Operating Systems,
So it may not be able to Accelerate the performance of Guest System.

By Clicking OK, user agreed to this information and will continue.
MSG_CREATEVM_DESC_EXIST:
Guest System already exists,
Forcing create VM may cause problem.
